name: dialogic
description: A template based NLG system and rule based dialog handler for conversational AI

scripts.docs:
echo "# Dialogic Architecture
This document is read-only and is automatically generated by JSDoc.
$(jsdoc2md src/*.js index.js)" > docs.md
scripts.docker-run: docker run --name dialogic-test test npm test && rm -rf coverage && docker cp dialogic-test:/app/coverage ./coverage
scripts.docker-test: npm run docker-setup && npm run docker-run && npm run docker-cleanup && echo ok || echo test suite failed, run npm run docker-cleanup to remove container!

author: Ian Bicket
